summary: A Keras layer that takes a list of tensors with identical shapes and returns a single tensor containing the element‑wise minimum of the inputs. The output retains the same shape as the inputs and can be used to merge parallel branches in a model.
business_intent: Enable neural‑network architectures to combine multiple feature streams by selecting the smallest value at each position, facilitating gating, attention, or other logic that relies on element‑wise comparison across inputs.
